metric_definition: Required inputs exist and are accessible in structured format
notes: Score 5 if all data fields populated consistently

metric_definition: Data is clean consistent and reliable with minimal missing values
notes: Score 5 if less than 5% missing data

metric_definition: Process follows documented steps with clear handoffs
notes: Score 5 if fully documented SOPs exist

metric_definition: Required systems can be integrated via APIs or exports
notes: Score 5 if APIs available with documentation

metric_definition: Task can be broken into rule-based or pattern-based steps
notes: Score 5 if clear if-then logic or templates exist

metric_definition: Language patterns are predictable and classifiable
notes: Score 5 if ticket text follows consistent patterns

metric_definition: Frequency and severity of edge cases requiring human judgment
notes: Score 5 means more than 30% tickets need human judgment

metric_definition: How well AI can assist vs replace human
notes: Score 5 if clear assist opportunities exist

metric_definition: Regulatory requirements or data sensitivity constraints
notes: Score 5 means PII or financial data involved

metric_definition: Risk of wrong AI response causing churn or escalation
notes: Score 5 means errors directly impact customer relationship

metric_definition: How forgiving is the process if AI makes mistakes
notes: Score 5 if errors easily caught and corrected
